## ðŸ“– How to Use Installation Links

1. **Click on VS Code or VS Code Insiders badge** above
2. **Confirm the installation dialog** that appears
3. **Prompt will be added** to your `.github/prompts/` directory
4. **Use in chat** with `/prompt-name` (e.g., `/create-readme`)

---

## ðŸ’¡ Quick Start After Installation

### Load Instructions First
```
#shell-scripting-guidelines
#github-actions-ci-cd-best-practices
#code-review-generic
```

### Then Use Prompts
```
/create-readme          # Generate project documentation
/create-llms-txt        # Create AI context file
/review-and-refactor    # Review your provisioning scripts
/git-flow-branch-creator # Create organized branches
/conventional-commit    # Generate standard commits
```
